text.data: Taicho: Matelite!! Endure it! We had hoped that this day would come someday...[end]
Palpaleos: I want to talk with [character][0x0]. Can you wait for me inside...?[end]
[character][0x1]: Please, [character][0x0]... He's very important to me...[end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x0]... Sorry... Help me up, if you could...[end]
Sendak: [character][0x0]... I am of no use, am I...?[end]
Sendak... You're our last hope... You're exactly right, you old fogy...[end1]
[character][0x0]... I... I cannot take the place of the princess...[end]
